001package es.unileon.prg1.ticTacToe;
002import java.awt.Window;
003import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
004import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
005
006import javax.swing.JButton;
007import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
008
009public class GameBoard implements ActionListener{
010        private int[][] winCombinations = 
011                        new int[][] { { 0, 1, 2 }, { 3, 4, 5 }, { 6, 7, 8 }, // horizontal wins
012                        { 0, 3, 6 }, { 1, 4, 7 }, { 2, 5, 8 }, // vertical wins
013                        { 0, 4, 8 }, { 2, 4, 6 } // diagonal wins
014        };
015        
016        private Window window;
017
018        private JButton[] buttons;
019        
020        private Player player1;
021
022        private Player player2;
023
024        private int count;
025
026        public GameBoard(Window window, TicTacToe ticTacToe){
027                // Assign the window where the GameBoard will be included
028                this.window = window;
029                // Creates the array of buttons of the GameBoard
030                this.buttons = new JButton[9];
031                
032                // Creates the nine buttons
033                for (int i = 0; i <= 8; i++) {
034                        // Stores the buttons in the array of buttons
035                        buttons[i] = new JButton();
036                        // 
037                        this.window.add(buttons[i]);
038                        buttons[i].addActionListener(this);
039                }
040                
041                this.count = 0;
042
043        }
044
045        public void setPlayers(Player player1, Player player2){
046                this.player1 = player1;
047                this.player2 = player2;
048        }
049        
050        @Override
051        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent actionEvent) {
052                Player winner;
053                Mark mark;
054                
055                Object source = actionEvent.getSource();
056
057                count++;
058
059                /* Calculate whose turn it is */
060                if (count % 2 == 0) {
061                        mark = this.player2.getMark();
062                } else {
063                        mark = this.player1.getMark();
064                }
065
066                /* Write the mark to the button and deactivate it */
067                JButton pressedButton = (JButton) source;
068                // Write the mark in both the enabled and disabled modes
069                pressedButton.setIcon(mark.getIcon());
070                pressedButton.setDisabledIcon(mark.getIcon());
071                pressedButton.setEnabled(false);
072
073                /* Show a dialog when game is over */
074                if ( isThereAWinner() == true) {
075                        /* Determine who won */
076                        if (mark.equals(player1.getMark()))
077                                winner = player1;
078                        else
079                                winner = player2;
080                        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, winner + " wins the game!");
081                        int answer = JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null, "Start",
082                                        "Do you want to start a new game",
083                                        JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION);
084
085                        if (answer == JOptionPane.YES_OPTION) {
086                                clearIt();
087                        } else {
088                                JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Thank you " + this.player1
089                                                + " and " + this.player2 + " for playing");
090                                System.exit(0);
091                        }
092
093                } else if (count == 9) {
094                        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "The game was tie!");
095                        int answer = JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null, "Start",
096                                        "Do you want to start a new game",
097                                        JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION);
098                        if (answer == JOptionPane.YES_OPTION) {
099                                clearIt();
100                        } else {
101                                JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Thank you " + this.player1
102                                                + " and " + this.player2 + " for playing");
103                                System.exit(0);
104                        }
105
106                }
107                
108        }
109        
110        private boolean isThereAWinner(){
111                boolean winner;
112                
113                winner = false;
114                
115                for (int i = 0; i <= 7; i++) {
116                        if ( ( this.buttons[winCombinations[i][0]].getIcon() ==  this.buttons[winCombinations[i][1]].getIcon() ) 
117                                        &&
118                                        ( this.buttons[winCombinations[i][1]].getIcon() == this.buttons[winCombinations[i][2]].getIcon() )
119                                        &&
120                                        ( this.buttons[winCombinations[i][0]].getIcon() != null) ) {
121                                winner = true;
122                        }
123                }
124        
125                return winner;
126        }
127        
128        public void clearIt(){
129                // Resets the nine buttons
130                for (int i = 0; i <= 8; i++) {
131                        buttons[i].setIcon(null);
132                        buttons[i].setEnabled(true);
133                }
134                this.count = 0;
135        }
136        
137}
